original_title: Bohra community calls on Prime Minister
original_body_lines: A group of leading members of the Bohra community of Sri Lanka called on Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena to express gratitude for the cooperation extended to Bohra centres and international conventions.  They briefed the Prime Minister about the religious and welfare activities of their centres. They also said the Bohra spiritual leader and 53rd Da’i al-Mutlaq, Mufaddal Saifuddin wish to meet the Prime Minister during the visit to Sri Lanka in March 2023. The group included Yusuf Huzein, Abdeali Khuzema, Fakhrudeen and Mustafa Yusufally.
